abstract: A dictionary of key-value pairs that describe the filter.
overview:
## Discussion

This dictionary contains two kinds of key-value pairs:

For example, the attributes dictionary for the `CIColorControls` filter contains the following information:

items.description: A name associated with a filter.
items.name: name

items.description: A Boolean value that determines whether the filter is enabled. Animatable.
items.name: isEnabled

items.description: The names of all input parameters to the filter.
items.name: inputKeys

items.description: The names of all output parameters from the filter.
items.name: outputKeys

items.description: Returns a [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage] object that encapsulates the operations configured in the filter.
items.name: outputImage

title: attributes
